title: 4Him Discography 1990-2006 (15 Releases)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------
4HIM DISCOGRAPHY
--------------------------------------------------------------

This discography may or may not be complete.  It contains the following 15 releases...

 * 1990 - 4Him
 * 1991 - Face The Nation
 * 1992 - The Basics of Life
 * 1993 - The Season Of Love Christmas
 * 1994 - The Ride Of Life
 * 1997 - The Message
 * 1998 - Obvious
 * 1999 - Best Ones
 * 2000 - Hymns - Place Of Worship
 * 2001 - Chapter One - A Decade
 * 2001 - Walk On
 * 2003 - Visible
 * 2003 - World Service
 * 2004 - Simply 4Him
 * 2006 - Encore - For Futher Generations

4Him was a Contemporary Christian group founded in 1990 in Alabama, USA. The group has a Grammy nomination, ten Dove awards and three certified gold albums to their credit. The group was inducted into Alabama's Music Hall of Fame, following the awarding of The GovernorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Achievement Award. The group has also been featured performers for popular Christian Evangelist crusaders, Billy Graham and Louis Palau.

For Him,
TorrentTracts - October 2013
